title: Fact Check: Fake 'TIME...to go' Cover Featuring Donald Trump Goes Viral
subtitle: The Logical Indian Fact Check team investigates the claim that TIME magazine cover features Donald Trump walking out the door
author: thelogicalindian.com
vclaim:
A viral graphic which appears to be the cover of the latest issue of the TIME magazine featuring the United States President Donald Trump is being circulated online.

The headline of this apparent cover reads,'TIME...to go' and shows the silhouette of the Trump exiting a door.

Social media posts show TIME magazine cover featuring Donald Trump with the message "TIME...to go" On comparing an original TIME Magazine cover with the graphic several discrepancies popped out. Below is one of the recent covers of TIME Magazine:

(1) Date of the issue on the top right corner. (2) The TIME.com stamp at the bottom right corner. Further, TIME Magazine usually announces the launch of its news issues online. No such post for the viral graphic could be found.

If you have any news that you believe needs to be fact-checked, please email us at factcheck@thelogicalindian.com or WhatsApp at 6364000343
